Vouch Mobile in Ohio: Unlimited Plans on AT&T's Network

Get unlimited talk, text & data in the Buckeye State for just $30/month. No credit check required.

Data from Ohio Census Data

Ohio's hardworking families know the value of a dollar. From Cleveland's resurgence to Columbus's tech boom, Vouch Mobile delivers big-city coverage at a price that respects Midwestern values.

AT&T Network Coverage in Ohio

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Ohio residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Buckeye State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

According to the FCC Broadband Map, AT&T provides extensive wireless coverage throughout Ohio, including urban centers and many rural areas.

Major Ohio Cities We Cover

Vouch Mobile provides excellent coverage in all major Ohio metropolitan areas:

Columbus

Full 5G coverage in the state capital and fastest-growing Ohio city

Cleveland

Comprehensive coverage in Northeast Ohio, from downtown to the suburbs

Cincinnati

Strong coverage in the Tri-State area including Over-the-Rhine

Toledo

Excellent coverage in Northwest Ohio

Akron

Full coverage in the Rubber City

Dayton

Reliable service in the Miami Valley

Why Ohio Residents Choose Vouch Mobile

  • Ohio's average phone bill of $104/month takes a chunk out of paychecks—Vouch cuts that by 71%.
  • Whether you're commuting on I-71, cheering on the Buckeyes, or working in Columbus's tech scene, you need reliable coverage.
  • No credit check means Ohio State students, new Ohio residents, and gig workers can sign up instantly.
  • AT&T's network covers Ohio from Lake Erie to the Ohio River, with excellent coverage in the C's: Columbus, Cleveland, and Cincinnati.

The JobsOhio shows that Ohio has a high economic data, making affordable phone service even more valuable.

How to Get Started in Ohio

  1. Check Your Phone: Make sure your phone is unlocked and compatible. Learn how to check.
  2. Choose Your Plan: Select our $30/month unlimited plan.
  3. Order Your SIM: Free shipping to any Ohio address.
  4. Activate Online: Simple activation takes just minutes. See our switching guide.
  5. Start Saving: Enjoy unlimited service across Ohio.

Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% population coverage across Ohio using AT&T's network. From Columbus to Cleveland, Cincinnati to Toledo, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout the Buckeye State.

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's network in Ohio. AT&T provides extensive 5G coverage in Columbus, Cleveland, and Cincinnati, plus reliable LTE across the state.

Vouch Mobile costs $30/month for unlimited talk, text, and data—no matter where you live in Ohio. The average Ohioan pays $104/month for phone service, so you could save over $888 per year by switching to Vouch.

No credit check required. Whether you're an Ohio State student, a new Columbus resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly.

Switching is easy: check that your phone is unlocked, order a free Vouch SIM card shipped to your Ohio address, then activate online in minutes. You can keep your existing phone number—we'll handle the port.

Yes! 5G is available in Columbus, Cleveland, Cincinnati, Toledo, Akron, Dayton, and many other Ohio cities. Your 5G access is included free with your $30/month plan.

Yes. AT&T's network covers communities throughout Ohio, including smaller towns and agricultural areas. Most populated areas have strong service.
